faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Find answers to the most common questions about how the platform works, profile verification, responsibilities, and data protection.

howItWorks.question: How does the platform work?
howItWorks.answer:
Our platform connects students with qualified tutors.

The process is simple:

- The student creates an account.
- He searches for a tutor based on subject, level and location.
- He reviews available profiles.
- He contacts the tutor via the integrated chat.

Classes take place outside the platform (online or in-person depending on agreement).

We facilitate the connection, but we do not directly provide lessons.

credibility.question: How do you ensure the credibility of tutors?
credibility.answer:
Credibility is a priority for us.

Each tutor must:

- Create a detailed profile
- Fill in their skills
- Provide justifying evidence (diplomas, certificates, experience)

Our team:

- Reviews submitted documents
- Checks information consistency
- Verifies or rejects the profile

If the information is compliant → The account gets the status "Verified Profile"
Otherwise → The account remains "Unverified"

verifiedStatus.question: What is the difference between a verified and unverified profile?
verifiedStatus.answer:
**Verified Profile**

- Identity controlled
- Skills justified
- Trust badge visible on profile

**Unverified Profile**

- Only declarative information
- No official validation performed
- Use at the student's discretion

We strongly recommend choosing verified profiles.

responsibility.question: Is the platform responsible in case of a problem?
responsibility.answer:
The platform only facilitates the connection.

We are **not responsible** for:

- The content of the lessons
- Payments made outside the platform
- Agreements made between users

However, we can:

- Suspend an account
- Remove a profile
- Investigate in case of a report

pricing.question: Is the platform free?
pricing.answer:
Currently, the platform is **completely free** for all users (students and tutors).

In the future, some premium services may be offered (better visibility, advanced statistics, profile highlighting, etc.).

payments.question: How do payments work?
payments.answer:
Payments are made **directly** between the student and the tutor.

The platform does not yet manage financial transactions.

reporting.question: How to report a problem or inappropriate behavior?
reporting.answer:
Each user can:

- Report a profile
- Report a message
- Contact support

After analysis, we can:

- Warn the account
- Temporarily suspend it
- Permanently delete the profile

dataProtection.question: Are my data protected?
dataProtection.answer:
Yes.

We protect personal data in accordance with security standards.

Documents submitted for verification are **not publicly visible**.

Only the status "Verified" appears on the profile.

unverifiedAccess.question: Why are some profiles accessible even if they are not verified?
unverifiedAccess.answer:
We want to allow all users to join the platform quickly.

However:

- Unverified profiles are **not recommended**
- They may be less visible in search results
- They do not display the trust badge

postChat.question: What happens after a chat exchange?
postChat.answer:
After the first contact:

- Both parties discuss the terms
- They agree on the format (online or in-person)
- They organize the sessions

They can leave a review (if this feature is enabled later).

The platform can track:

- The number of connections
- Interactions
- Overall statistics (admin side)

transparencyMessage.title: Important Transparency Notice
transparencyMessage.content:
The platform is a connection tool and **not** a training organization.

We encourage users to:

- Verify profiles
- Clearly discuss terms
- Formalize their agreements

privacy.intro: At G-Teach, the protection of your personal data is our top priority. This privacy policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your information when you use our platform.
privacy.section1Text: We collect the following data when you create an account or use our services:
section1Items: Identification information: full name, email address, password (encrypted)
Profile data: photo, biography, qualifications, specializations
Verification documents (for tutors): diplomas, certificates, CV
Usage data: pages visited, interactions, messages exchanged
Technical data: IP address, browser type, cookie data
privacy.section2Text: Your data is used exclusively to:
section2Items: Create and manage your user account
Facilitate connections between students and tutors
Improve our services and user experience
privacy.section3Text: We implement technical and organizational security measures to protect your personal data. Documents submitted for verification are never made public. Only authorized administrative staff have access to them as part of the verification process.
privacy.section4Text: G-Teach does not sell your personal data to third parties. Your information may be shared only in the following cases:
section4Items: With other platform users within the scope of information displayed on your public profile
With our technical providers (hosting, authentication) strictly within the scope of our contracts
If required by law or a competent authority
privacy.section5Text: In accordance with applicable regulations, you have the following rights regarding your data:
section5Items: Right of access: review the data we hold about you
Right of rectification: correct inaccurate data
Right to erasure: request deletion of your account
Right to portability: export your data
Right to object: refuse certain processing
privacy.section6Text: Your data is retained as long as your account is active. After account deletion, data is erased within 30 days, unless there is a legal obligation to retain it.

cookies.intro: This cookie policy explains what cookies are, how G-Teach uses them, and how you can control them.
cookies.section1Text: A cookie is a small text file stored on your device (computer, smartphone, tablet) when you visit a website. Cookies are widely used to make websites work efficiently and to provide information to website owners.

cookieTypes.name: Essential Cookies
cookieTypes.desc: These cookies are essential for the platform to function. They manage your login session and ensure the security of your data. They cannot be disabled.

cookieTypes.name: Functional Cookies
cookieTypes.desc: These cookies remember your preferences (language, region, display settings) to personalize your experience on G-Teach.

cookieTypes.name: Analytics Cookies
cookieTypes.desc: These cookies help us understand how visitors interact with our platform. We use this anonymous data to improve our services.

cookieTypes.name: Performance Cookies
cookieTypes.desc: These cookies collect information about how you use the platform (pages visited, time spent) to optimize performance.

cookies.section3Text: You can control and manage cookies in several ways:
section3Items: Via your browser settings: you can block or delete cookies directly from your browser options
Via our cookie banner: on your first visit, you can choose to accept or reject non-essential cookies
By disabling analytics cookies: with no impact on platform functionality
cookies.section3Note: Please note that blocking certain cookies may affect your experience on G-Teach, particularly for login functionality.

cookieDurations.duration: Deleted when the browser is closed
